Title: Classic XXXL Bean Bag with Beans in Black Colour
Description: Sattva a Sanskrit word which is one of the three gunas or qualities an individual possesses. Sattva is the quality of harmony, goodness, purity and creativity. Sattva is a recognised brand owned by its parent company, Excel Ventures. Sattva offers top class products under bean bags, cushions, neck pillows and collapsible furniture. Many gamers enjoy playing while perched in a bean bag chair. These come in various types, but often include a structured seating area.
